test.name: Simple test to add class for an Exercise activity table

table:table-cell.text:p: Question stem, for example what color is an orange?
This is general feedback for the question.
No, an orange is not blue.
No, an orange is not red.

th.p: Question stem, for example what color is an orange?

td.p: This is general feedback for the question.
No, an orange is not blue.
No, an orange is not red.
